diacheck.java.libs.imageTools

Class ImageTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • diacheck.java.libs.imageTools.ImageTransformer

  • public class ImageTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
    ImageTransformer is mainly the class responsible for manipulating the data in the image file. Most important features are rotation and cropping, which enables the ImageReader class to read less but more relevant data.
    Author:
    Anton Österberg
